description.text:
I can't believe I found a traveler! 
We're going to be the bestest of bestiest friends! 

Now I can go on an adventure!
Explore the world, taste new colours, meet weird creatures, try out new kinds of food!
Oh...the Food! I can't wait!

Let's go! Let's go already!
But wait! You will need to $(b;spring)craft$() a $(b;spring)'sophisticated' backpack$() to store all our treasures!
Finally! Yes, yes you look very 'Sophisticated'....It might need a bit of colour! Let's go on our adventure!
